title: Govt completing low-cost housing projects on priority basis: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 7 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday said that the government was completing the low-cost housing projects on priority basis.
The provision of loan along with subsidy to the poor and middle class for low-cost housing was being ensured for the first time in country, he added.
The Prime Minister was talking to Minister of State for Housing and Works Muhammad Shabbir Ali Qureshi, who called on him here.
Besides progress of development projects under the Ministry of Housing, the ongoing development projects under the South Punjab Package were also discussed in the meeting.
The Prime Minister said that the development of South Punjab was among the governmentâ€™s foremost priorities.
